documentType: aircraft registration application and bill of sale
summary: This document contains various aircraft registration applications and bills of sale related to the Keystone Helicopter S-76C, serial number 760750. It includes details about ownership transfers, registration changes, and requests for special registration numbers. The document is subject to protective orders and contains multiple references to individuals and organizations involved in the aircraft's registration.

connections.description: Both are associated with ASI Wings LLC, involved in the aircraft registration process.
Brandt S. Sterling represents ASI Wings LLC in legal matters regarding aircraft registration.

events.title: Aircraft Sale
events.description: The aircraft with registration number N722JE was sold to ASI Wings LLC.

events.title: Aircraft Bill of Sale
events.description: The aircraft was sold to Hyperion Air LLC.

events.title: Request for Duplicate Registration
events.description: A request was made for a duplicate Certificate of Registration for the aircraft.

events.title: Special Registration Number Assignment
events.description: An assignment of special registration number N162AE was issued for the aircraft.

keyFacts: The aircraft in question is a Keystone Helicopter S-76C with serial number 760750.
Multiple ownership transfers and registration applications are documented.
Several individuals are involved in the legal and administrative processes related to the aircraft's registration.
The document is subject to protective orders, indicating sensitive information may be present.
